schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts lightning fast and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year-old car driver wanted to turn left with her VW coming from Merklingen on the state road 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: She overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist coming from the direction of Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: In the event of a collision, hand and foot brake levers fly away
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker still tried to avoid the car, but touched it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: As a result of the grazing process, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mindfully, he steered his motorcycle in the green stiffeners next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker suffered an injury on the Beim and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvesters infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a corona mass infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are quarantined and are no longer allowed to leave the company.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the curfew.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvesters were tested positive for the corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the series examination, as reported by the Dingolfing-Landau district office on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "In order to avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population," explained Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Seven employees had previously been infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - the cucumbers, however, only for jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with a good 3,300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to keep calm: "According to our information, it is a closed circle of people".
np-coburg.de.105627.10: Infected and uninfected employees were separated on the farm and the site is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and the SPD shared responsibility with the state government.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus S ö der (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting to control the housing of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can take bitter revenge if such local infectious events take hold and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said J ü rgen Mistol, the parliamentary managing director of the Greens.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a similar view: "After the Corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control programme for farms with harvesters," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "From our point of view, hygiene conditions at the workplace and living conditions in particular must be tightly controlled.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Underground station Aidenbachstra ß e: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after Schubser
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: In a dispute between two youth groups at the subway station Aidenbachstra ß e, a 19-year-old fell through a shovel and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday, there was a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstra ß e underground station around 4.15 p.m.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, who approached with several stripes.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a 17-year-old from Munich pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slipped over the platform edge and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped the fallen man to climb off the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger of an approaching railway.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were further clashes between the two people.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old escaped from the scene, but his identity could be determined retrospectively.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to Police Inspectorate 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is under investigation for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer urges longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer, however, calls for an extension of the storage period according to a media report.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for an extended data retention period of six months instead of the planned ten weeks.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the "Bild am Sonntag" reports, Seehofer Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) asked in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer therefore wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He believes it makes sense to "make urgently needed adjustments to the law now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision of the ECJ is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the amendments in advance so that they can be applied immediately after a possible positive verdict, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesman for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it would only be possible to meaningfully examine whether there was a need for legal adjustments once the courts had ruled.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the L ä nder, had already advocated data retention in June.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament grounds in Disney World in Orlando / Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN, is back in Isloation, being tested daily on Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for visiting: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year, "Sweet Lou", as he is called in the NBA, already expressed his love for these very wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta, D. R.) have the best wings in town".
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA has imposed a ten-day quarantine on Williams.
bild.255016.10: The Clippers star missed the first two official games after the test phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to finish the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: The top 22 teams are currently preparing for the season finale, which starts on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: S ö der comments on the corona situation after mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has startled authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvesters from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have been infected with the corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is fenced off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering the 3,300 residents of the community free corona tests.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvesters had little contact with the local population, the district office has so far assumed that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Remorse": Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has been cooperative," lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense attorney added, "He deeply regrets the deeds, the confession was a liberation for him."
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and deeply affected by the extent of the destruction".
kurier.at.204625.5: According to the prosecutor's office, if convicted, the man could face ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic Cathedral of St. Peter and Paul in Nantes was severely damaged in a fire on Saturday night last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire broke out in three places far apart in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The suspect was arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: He was released after one day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came into the eye of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discussing the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended that consideration be given to abolishing the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss laying down conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli," Grindel told Bild am Sonntag.
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous in Bavaria and Dortmund, the 50 + 1 rules do not work anyway: See Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, there is no getting around the debate as to whether it is not advisable to facilitate the involvement of investors in clubs that want to break into this phalanx ".
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority participation, which is prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to build investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a European internal market," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former head of the DFB sees the danger that "the attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more tension in the championship."
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV money would not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern has a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund 500 million and RB Leipzig 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences between the first three clubs alone are immense.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million, "explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking back at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and pierced the press instead of addressing me," Grindel said about the adoption of an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "That has already occupied me very much in human terms."
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a breach of compliance and it was right to draw the consequences," Grindel said.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and innocently.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many people in the DFB knew about it. "
infranken.de.309597.20: He never "made a secret of the gift," the 58-year-old assured.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naive, but this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": Injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: Protests against police violence in the United States have intensified again with Donald Trump's use of federal police in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday there were clashes between demonstrators and police in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a march was crossing a crossroads.
faz.79601.6: Clashes had previously occurred in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas on Saturday night and violently dispersed demonstrators.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of protesters, some armed, marched through Louisville, Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in a drug raid in her apartment in Louisville in March.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who didn't live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: On Saturday, three people were injured when a member of a group calling itself an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators of a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: The two groups ultimately did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, a person was shot and killed during a "Black Lives Matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: The police claimed to have arrested a suspect.
faz.79601.18: No further details of the circumstances of the attack have been provided.
faz.79601.19: Mayor Steve Adler, according to the New York Times, said he, like many in the city, was "heartbroken and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Demonstrators also clashed with the police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction vehicles in front of a youth prison, and the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police or assault.
faz.79601.23: A courthouse was set on fire in Oakland, California.
faz.79601.24: A small group of demonstrators smashed windows, shot down fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police said late Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver, Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: According to the police, one of the demonstrators fired a gun and at least one person was taken to hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court and a fire was set, according to the police.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big party was missing in the spa town, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: The Rakoczy weekend without Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: Even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale, Rakoczy-Ball or pageant, many got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when only the historical ones were in the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konh ä user has been visiting Bad Kissingen with her husband for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: This time, too, in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple has made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, observes the historical while strolling and listens to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it quite pleasant," says Konh ä user.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But it lacks the usual program highlights, above all Saale burns on Friday evening as well as the historic procession and the closing fireworks on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year, "she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy-equestrian tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, Christina Gold, who participates in the parade in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgarten cafes.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she was walking around the city in costume on Saturdays and Sundays.
infranken.de.309607.21: "That's more strenuous, otherwise we'll have it easier," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The equestrian club had less to do, even if there were individual riders in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the equestrian quadrille can take place again next year," says Chairman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy equestrian tournament will be held again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases at Spanish second-division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish football second division CF Fuenlabrada slides deeper and deeper into the crisis because of a corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from the vicinity of Madrid flew to a game in the city of A Coruamonga on July 20, despite the first corona cases, one low blow follows the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had been tested positive, and one was hospitalized, the club said.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name southwest of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now even the relegation to the B-group of the Second League threatens.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruamonga last Monday was canceled at the last moment, the prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, the supreme sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: Players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel or gel," the sports newspaper "AS" wrote.
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show how players hung up underwear and club clothes in their rooms in the hotel to dry after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: The bed linen was not changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It is neither good nor sufficient, wrote "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas, rejected the accusation of deliberately endangering public health.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: According to Javier Tebas, son of the President of the Spanish Primera Division, the Corona rules were not violated, as reported by the Europa Press news agency and the sports newspaper "Marca".
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before take-off, there had been four infected persons by 19 July, but they were all isolated and had not travelled with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Just before the flight on Monday to A Coruamonga, all players and team members had been tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruamonga, the corona test was positive for "five or six" other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was cancelled 60 minutes before the kick-off, said Tebas Llanas.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police must catch horses torn out of steam compartment
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police took her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning, shortly before 6 o'clock, a road user informed two free-running horses on the feeder between the junction Donnersdorf / Steinsfeld and the motorway junction Theres.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the officers were able to gain the trust of the horses shortly before Dampfach, they had a rope put down in the patrol car.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career continuation imaginable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt / Main - The seven-time world champion Tony Martin can well imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently working with the team to define the framework conditions for how and in what form things could continue," said the 35-year-old to the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung".
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: The negotiations with his team were also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or about other problems that would plague him as a family man, Martin said.
azonline.de.86610.8: He had previously stood up after a fall, and the first thought was: "Get back on the bike quickly.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a little daughter, I think: What if ".
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are aspects that he finds increasingly difficult to deal with.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it was good for me to remember what I enjoyed cycling and how much I enjoyed it, based on the Corona time."
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist will return to the competition at the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's streets at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the motorcycle tour ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Sch ö nthal - Several, mostly young people died in accidents on Bavaria's roads over the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit by a car near Sch ö nthal (district of Cham) on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car got into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria on Saturday, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his machine.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was downhill at Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn, he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, the police said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad K ö tzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a street during the night of Sunday and was overrun by a 42-year-old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver could not brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: At Sch ö nberg (Freyung-Grafenau district) on Saturday, a 57-year-old biker crashed head-on into a car in a right-hand bend despite full braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the accident scene.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, the other three people in the car remained uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Transport Minister Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underride protection on guardrails and the mitigation of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "We have achieved a lot for the safety of motorcyclists in recent years," the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorised two-wheelers killed fell by around 28 percent compared to 2011."
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt / Main (dpa) - Soccer coach Niko Kovac will soon be reunited with Eintracht Frankfurt with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will make a guest appearance at the Hesse, the former club of the Croat, on 1 August (6 p.m.).
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, it is the first and only toughest test before the return match in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Because of the coronavirus pandemic, the match is played without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We are particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends, "Kovac explained.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: The 48-year-old said that this was an interesting test in terms of sport.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before joining FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached Hesse from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB Cup.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us with regard to the match against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like everyone in Frankfurt, I'm looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again, "said Eintracht coach Adi H ü tter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croat at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurt team had lost the first round match against Basel in their own stadium 0-3.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Almost 50 new infections: Hof district just past the lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the county of Hof, the number of known new corona infections has increased further over the weekend: From 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and no longer falls into this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: This brings the Hof area closer to the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in a week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 dead due to monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: The severe floods in Southeast Asia have affected more than 9 million people, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: A total of 700 people were killed due to the heavy monsoon rains.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their crops.
euronews-de.199228.7: Tank rhinos in national park die by landslides
euronews-de.199228.8: In Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 tank rhinos were killed by landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are protected and considered endangered.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year, the floods are particularly severe, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the village of Cox's Bazaar in southern Bangladesh, the state has built housing for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far, only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It is difficult to bring people to Cox's Bazaar.
euronews-de.199228.16: The enthusiasm also persists in Grenezn.
euronews-de.199228.17: Anyone who used to have a house, no matter how small and resembling a hut, often does not want to spend his life in a large apartment block.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments are empty, but the government wants them to be occupied soon by those who have lost their homes due to the floods.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "That would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair," a statement said.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors".
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: Argentina is therefore asking its private creditors to forego some of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is once again threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, lenders had called for higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate was recently more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: Experts expect economic power to decline by around ten percent in the current year.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: By the end of May, Argentina had failed to settle interest claims amounting to $503 million and had slipped into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.1: Arrived at work - not yet privately
pnp.de.390078.2: "Things are going super well" - this is the conclusion drawn by Dr. Stefanie Kramer after her first days at the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she would succeed Lutz Feller at the Eggenfelden notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law started work, and normal day-to-day business has long been running at full speed.
pnp.de.390078.5: "Privately, however, I still have to arrive," she explains in an interview with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to completely relocate the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native of Dingolfing.
pnp.de.390078.7: She and her husband, who works as a judge at the regional court in Regensburg, are currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was still able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to be able to guarantee the care of the two daughters (3 gifted and 1 gifted).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute every day from Regensburg, she also has an overnight stay with her parents in Dingolfing, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighboring district, the city of Eggenfelden has of course long been known to her.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits on site with her family in recent months, she once again stated: "Eggenfelden is a really nice small town".
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had won the competition for the vacancy.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her native Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship and the second state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen im Unterallg ä u and Regensburg - during which time she also "incidentally" shouldered her doctorate in labour law - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalm ü nster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she took parental leave and finally moved to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representation services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for a full return to work, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: Dr. Stefanie Kramer has taken over the entire team of her predecessor, who will take over the holiday representation in the notary's office in the future - and immediately has praise for the team of the law firm: "Things are going super well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-rehearsed processes makes it easier for her to take care of the impending relocation of the private center of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: She has already contacted a local institution regarding kindergarten and nursery places.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything works out as desired, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent full at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulation, which must be complied with, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators," Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told the "Tagesspiegel".
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds a little more than 81,000 spectators at Bundesliga games.
an-online.de.487062.5: In the ghost games caused by the Corona pandemic last season, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitisation and internationalisation at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality sector can also be opened again: "It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues completely disappear".
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable page length for the time being".
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people are in short-time work in Germany alone, then the need for entertainment is limited," Cramer explained.
an-online.de.487062.9: The head of marketing in Dortmund praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which is intended to help overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work."
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early start into life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packer of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: That was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of about 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the Grazer Kinderklinik.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extremely lightweight with less than a kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully developed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so tender that they could injure the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers specially made for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they wouldn't be in the voice - "and how", Berndt Urlesberger smiles.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if they don't scream quite as loudly as big babies, of course."
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona theater in the classroom: The whiteboard as a stage experienced shortly before the start of the holiday the 9th grades of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgm ü nd.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the production "Das Heimatkleid" to the students - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the pupils were able to exchange views on the play and the performance with the actress and director Winfried Tobias via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born from the current Corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was pleased about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if all participants agreed at the end that the direct encounter in the theater and stage space would offer additional stimuli, you can also see the potential for contact with the schools in the theater.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we continue to improve the technical framework, it could be an interesting addition to the running of the game," said director Winfried Tobias.

mz-web.de.376296.1: "Blown away by the wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes in Paris on Sunday at the age of 104, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was best known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern epic Gone with the Wind (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as an infant.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian playwright Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia in Shakespeare's "Midsummer Night's Dream".
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her to a seven-year contract and released her alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the leading role of "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was released in Germany under the title "Mutterherz".
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later, she won the award for Best Actress in William Wyler's The Heiress.
mz-web.de.376296.12: She was also acclaimed as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit".
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier suggested her for the leading role in the 1952 film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel".
mz-web.de.376296.14: The play became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her longtime friend Bette Davis she played in "Lullaby for a Corpse".
mz-web.de.376296.16: From his marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953), he had a son Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter, Gisst ä lle le, with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: However, rumours of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath were never confirmed.

augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final of the beach volleyball tournament "Road to Timmendorf".
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in D ü sseldorf they lost in the semi-finals to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Fl ü ggen with 1: 2 (17: 21, 21: 17, 19: 21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Most recently, Thole / Wickler played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine, their conquerors Ehlers / Fl ü ggen conceded a defeat against the surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde with 0: 2 (17: 21, 17: 21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German Championships were played in Timmendorfer Strand at the beginning of September: The tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger / Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms / Richard Peem ü ller and Simon Pfretschner / Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz expulsion from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "fig leaf"
paz-online.de.95211.2: The expulsion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is in the view of the FDP only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the extreme right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD, "said FDP interior politician Benjamin Strasser to the news agency dpa in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of hearing the exclusion of Kalbitz, which the Federal Executive Board had decided by a majority in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from their party, officials like Bj ö rn H ö cke and his supporters would have been expelled long ago," Strasser said.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will in the AfD because right-wing extremism is now part of the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: Similarly, CSU General Secretary Markus Blume said: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and does not change anything," he told the "Welt am Sonntag".
paz-online.de.95211.10: "It speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist in the middle of the AfD still has."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will land below five percent in future elections.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are numbered".
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the now officially dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group chairman Bj ö rn H ö cke; the Verfassungsschutz classifies the coronation as a "secured right-wing extremist aspiration".
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive had thrown Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason, he stated that Kalbitz had not stated an earlier membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimattreue Deutsche Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the Left faction in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court did not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf has only eaten chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, with or without Kalbitz. "
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party nor the right wing would be weakened by this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The maneuver of the mutineers is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and try to get through under the radar, "said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD can't get rid of the ghosts they called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: Expulsion does not change anything, "said Brandenburg SPD General Secretary Erik Stohn, commenting on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here the AfD regional association and the fraction held to their right-wing leader until today".
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms deliver a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period of the previous year, said the network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: TenneT is responsible for the transmission of the North Sea electricity to the mainland and the transmission through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North Sea and the Baltic Sea will reach 13.73 TWh, compared to a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of total wind power in Germany, which is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities, because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: It is expected to increase to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea by 2030.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then," said Tim Meyerj ü rgens, Managing Director of Tennet.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, even at sea, wind farms are not able to exploit their capacity, but reach about 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is 2 January, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce around 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition of the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gm ü nder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: It was almost a small jubilee celebration for the 130th anniversary.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gm ü nder Kunstverein: The opening of the exhibition "Skirmish" with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold broke the usual framework after the Corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery the association "Sandtogether" was involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled because of Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, more than 30,000 people had attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We truly did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute," said Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-partisan).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But ultimately we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people here as organizers."
dnn-online.de.39567.7: If tens of thousands had flocked to the festival grounds and the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current Corona Protection Regulation could not have been observed.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so strong that there wouldn't have been much left of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organisational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: The city of Freital will then celebrate its 100th anniversary with the Winterberg Festival from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Dressage Olympic Champion Werth in Achleiten not to beat
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - The six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg scored four victories in four starts this weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning one Grand Prix each with Weihegold and Quantaz, she was unbeatable in the Grand Prix Special and in the Freestyle on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold Werth clearly prevailed against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen in the Special on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: Also in the freestyle on Saturday, the German was clearly ahead of her 34-year-old student Victoria Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Already at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago Werth had won all four important tests.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled for 14 to 16 August.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Applied Sciences in Worms continues to take to the skies: DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung is donating a professorship for "Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: The professorship gives students the opportunity to start their studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and the DFS Air Traffic Control Academy are utilised equally.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on setting up and filling the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester of 2019, the first students have been enrolled in the Air Traffic Management program as part of their training as air traffic controllers at Worms University of Applied Sciences.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, DFS 'experience has been very positive, and the students' performance has been outstanding.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training contributes significantly to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to continue to fulfil our legal mandate, we need highly qualified personnel, "says Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman and CEO of DFS, at the signing of the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing our good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpinning our attractiveness as an employer. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of the University of Applied Sciences Worms, also underlines this: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and business.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on the existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's degree programme in Air Traffic Management. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust placed in Deutsche Flugsicherung is both a motivation and an obligation for the University of Applied Sciences Worms to further expand its teaching and research expertise in the future fields of air traffic.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: In its commitment to the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative focal points for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary at the Ministry of Science, Continuing Education and Culture, emphasises: "With its focus on air transport, the University of Applied Sciences Worms has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the profile of the university. "

mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to examine other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The Corona crisis brought the situation in parts of the meat industry back to light.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they rightful - and will they remain so
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Minister of Labour Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to review other sectors in accordance with the strict regulations now planned against maladministration in the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for the respective industry if necessary," said Heil of the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the massive corona outbreak at the meat giant T ö nnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law of salvation this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to employ external personnel for slaughter, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: For this purpose, the use of contract workers and temporary workers is to be prohibited there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer President Ingo Kramer told the dpa: "Stay away from a general restriction of work contracts and hiring workers, if you do not want to completely strangle the economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Work contracts, for example, are mandatory for large areas of the trade, the construction industry and plant construction as the basis for their added value at the customer.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The misdeeds of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: "My goal is not to ban work contracts everywhere in the German economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "When an industrial company commissions a tradesman to install a safety system, it is a normal contract."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary agency work to be unconstitutional in its sector alone.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It is not possible to explain why different labour laws should apply to portioning and packaging cheese in the future than to sausages, according to a statement on the draft law, as reported by the "Neue Osnabr ü cker Zeitung" (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: A ban would therefore increase the consumer price by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW Occupational Safety and Health Administration, many Eastern European employees from work contract companies worked 16 hours a day in the industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also noted that the situation with regard to the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively harsh law had already come into force for the meat industry in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were circumvented by "tricky constructions".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now we have to clean up fundamentally".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: "In the Occupational Safety and Health Act, which we want to pass in the cabinet at the end of July, there are also measures that do not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher inspection rates for occupational safety or clear criteria for community accommodation".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft submitted to the DPA includes amendments to the Act on the Protection of Workers' Rights in the Meat Industry and the Occupational Safety and Health Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) believes that more intensive controls are necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to carry out even more controls in many areas of supervision: Food controls, animal welfare, everything possible, including animal transport, for example," said Nonnemacher on Sunday in the RBB programme "Brandenburg aktuell".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: However, more staff positions are also needed for more controls.

schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-W ü rttemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all the threats of punishment and court judgments, motorists continue to accelerate in countless illegal races on the roads of Baden-W ü rttemberg: Last year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparative figures for the years before, but the rapists are increasingly making work of the judicial authorities: In 2018, a total of 155 investigations were conducted at the public prosecutors' offices between Constance and Mannheim for illegal races, one year later there were already 252 and in the current year until the beginning of June already 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, as can be seen from the response of the Interior Ministry to a request of the state parliament SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or fled from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: At the wheel were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the racers caught and also asked to pay: According to the Interior Ministry, a total of 113 fines have been imposed since 2018 and 15 prison sentences have been pronounced.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other motorists reacted more sensitively than before because of the many tragic accidents and trials in recent years and reported more frequently, a ministry spokesman said.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: The Autobahn 8 is particularly popular with racers. Again and again, motorists slow down the traffic there in order to make room for themselves and to use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: On the A81, the police register even more races than on any other federal highway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: A speed limit is used there to try to slow down the racers on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers evade because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighboring country to the lawn to Germany.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few routes: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would get rid of this problem on motorways," says Martin Rivoir, the transport expert of the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for speedsters would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there at 200 kilometers per hour or more."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: "Anyone who defies all rules in this way and puts not only their own lives but also the lives of other road users at risk is hardly reachable with reason."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police crackdown
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: However, this is not enough for the ADAC: "We assume that speeders will not be deterred by the speed limits," says Holger Bach, Head of the Transport and Environment Department at the ADAC W ü rttemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: It calls for additional and tougher controls on the routes concerned.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Not infrequently, the high-speed test of strength becomes painful and serious: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people have died in the races nationwide, two of them uninvolved in a nightly crash in Stuttgart's city center and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have competed in a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, crashed into a garden wall and remained on the side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people were injured in the races over the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: In the opinion of Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, however, harsher penalties are not necessary: "There is no need for legislative action to impose tougher sanctions on illegal motor vehicle races," says the Interior Ministry's paper.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light of 23 July: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar

schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: In fact, he wore a black hoodie, black trousers and light shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: Further evidence is received by the police.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann has won his second day on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old Palatine from Team Bora-hansgrohe won the 109-kilometre section with start and finish in Sibiu in the mass sprint, after having already won a stage on Saturday.

pnp.de.390142.8: No less than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the new season with a win," Ackermann explained after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: With 300 meters to go, he simply put on his sprint, "and it worked perfectly."
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the UCI, a corona test was carried out on all participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, drivers and attendants were separated from the organising team and the media in insulated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.

infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorized tuning meeting - police intervene, 700 vehicles and about 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times more than 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" on Saturday night in the parking lot of a furniture store.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to intensify their control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A major tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (25 July 2020) in Nuremberg's S ü dstadt district.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the police of Middle Franconia, an increased number of vehicles in the area of a large car park in Ingolst ä dter Stra ß e was detected by the Nuremberg traffic police around 10.30 pm.
infranken.de.309656.7: The police then carried out a large number of vehicle inspections there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police had announced that they wanted to step up their action against so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part of the "scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers numbered a good 700 vehicles and about 1100 people at the top, according to the police.
infranken.de.309656.11: However, only a small part of those present can be attributed to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the police's appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: On the basis of the vehicles and people on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the majority of those present adhered to the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular the observance of the minimum distance and the wearing of a mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed at around 1: 00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials noticed such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The police headquarters in Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and will continue to carry out enhanced control measures, also in connection with the emergence of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The agency News5 spoke with J ü rgen Schr ö dinger from the towing company involved: "They all have beautiful rims, we must not scratch them," says Schr ö dinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this purpose.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must take care not to cause any damage.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back unscathed."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Employment Agency figures: 900 suspected cases of abuse in short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - The Federal Employment Agency (BA) claims to be investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time pay.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "With more than 880,000 companies reporting short-time work, this is extremely low," said Daniel Terzenbach, the Executive Board member responsible for operations, to the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When, at the beginning of the Corona crisis, a large number of companies suddenly applied for short-time work, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: The examination usually takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "We didn't have that much time in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will look all the more closely at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and we have perseverance. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Evidence of abuse would often come from the employees or trade unions concerned.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to detect abuse patterns.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we are preparing ourselves in the event of a case and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency money. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party dissolved in the New Garden
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
