pnn.de.185998.15: The event was disbanded by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after Corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, as reported by the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still outstanding in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to this, many of the infected are young interns in tourism companies, but at least one holiday guest was tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodation on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations here and there" of bookings, said the head of the tourism association Wolfgangsee, Hans Wieser, the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, about a third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday, the first infections had become public knowledge.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended the behaviour of the interns on Saturday, who had celebrated in several restaurants and may have contracted the disease there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all enjoyed doing that in our youth," he told the radio station Ö 1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism association launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees of the dangers of Covid-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: Starting on Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from 15 July were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak evokes memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which in the early phase of the pandemic was a center of corona spread throughout Europe.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1,500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focal points of the new infections are Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (AP) - Record English football champion Manchester United returns to the Champions League after a year's absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils finished third in the Premier League with a 2-0 win over Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to settle for the Europa League, because Chelsea FC was still passing by and also qualified for the premier league in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa was able to cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in extra time, Jesse Lingard (90. + 8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, Bayern's opponent in the Champions League round of 16, won 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45th + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45th + 4).
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's win over Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who passed the Wolves 1-1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace and finished sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford and Bournemouth, but had to tremble for a long time for West Ham United.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) was immediately compensated by Andrei Yarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which fired three coaches in the season, is relegated after five years in the first division.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which could not save itself by a 3: 1 (2: 1) at Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool, who have been the English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1: 1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest score the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach J ü rgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the point record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017 / 18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38.), Divock Origi (59.) and Sadio Mann (89.) turned the game on Sunday for Liverpool.
wn.de.700458.22: "It was an exceptional season for this wonderful club," said goalscorer van Dijk after the match, "which should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: In the end, the Premier League bosses should also be satisfied.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the Coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were suspended from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there were even discussions about a premature termination or a staging of the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played without special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night there were violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: On the night of Sunday, the Israeli police violently attacked participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to disperse the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people gathered near Netanyahu's office on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration supporting Netanyahu were also arrested, the news site "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to police reports, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray from a moving car on demonstrators on the roadside.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a stabbing attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: In Jerusalem and Tel Aviv there have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption process against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Most recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of premature easing and a lack of preparation for a second corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The Corona crisis has hit the country's economy hard.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The most recent unemployment rate was more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new coronavirus infections in Israel has recently risen to record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Transporter crashes on car - nine injured - Ruhr - Bild. De EN
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen caused nine minor injuries.
bild.254850.3: A female driver was driving with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Presumably she had suddenly slowed down because she wanted to turn."
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three passengers in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after Corona suspected case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to ward off the coronavirus as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: The country is now reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official Corona suspicion in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a large city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the most stringent epidemiological defenses in the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The Communist leadership declared the highest level of alarm.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea has not yet registered a single infection and described its defenses as a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of the disease were reportedly detected in an "outlier" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person fled to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: South Korea initially did not confirm the crossing of the border within the military buffer zone, which is four kilometres wide and still largely mined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: According to the Yonhap National News Agency, South Korea's military acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing to North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were carried out on a number of people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea claimed to have called an emergency meeting of the Workers' Party Politburo chaired by Kim Jong Un on Saturday on suspicion of the incident.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive catastrophe."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday, as a preventive measure, "to completely block Kaesong and isolate each district and the region from others," it continued.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned, as well as all people in Kaesong who had had contact with her, had been quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The central military commission of the party is therefore to investigate the "outbreak" and the behavior of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that there are about 300,000 people living in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Excitement ahead of Council meeting: City East and noise abatement are still up for discussion before a major summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the major project Innenstadtentwicklung-Ost," it says rather casually in the middle part of the city press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4.30 pm in the large hall of the Congress Center Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: In particular, the upgrading of the eastern city is controversial until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities in favour of this are scarce, and in some committees, depending on their attendance, they are even opposed.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed by the citizenry and then by the administration and local council fail after almost ten years of preparation, criticized project opponent Reinhard Klein as "extra-parliamentary opposition", "unsuspecting", "speculation", "denigration" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," says Klein, who has been the only representative of the Pforzheim Citizens' List on the municipal council for the past year.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the treaties, he was in this position: "I know what I am talking about".
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit would be cheaper for the city, the Technical Town Hall would be renovated for 8.5 million euros, contrary to statements of the city administration after subsidies, of whose existence Klein is convinced.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The development of the city will be very different from what was predicted in the town hall and by the supporters of the economy.
pz-news.de.72354.10: To shape the city by one's own efforts and not by an investor: That is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP / FW / UB / LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It also essentially provides for the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, the opening of the Schlo ß berg, the lease of the ex-Thales for administrative space and a small-scale inner-city redevelopment, ideally with local agencies.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from health noise pollution caused by road traffic, including many speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local traffic club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen because they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting regular bus traffic with thinned cycles and by little commitment to cycling, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the energy and climate protection agency Pforzheim / Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: In addition, the agenda includes accession to the Climate Protection Pact of the State of Baden-W ü rttemberg, the reassessment of parental contributions in the municipal day care centers and the application for inclusion in the Smart City funding of the federal government.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed corona protection measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: Tim Zimmermann starts his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July with a delay of almost half a year.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operation, the first test drives were now scheduled.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the Corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from starting his first official race in the new Lamborghini Huracan of Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old Langenargener completed his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With ABS, for example, you have to go into the corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really great fun. "
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: The Dutchman is already experienced in GT sports despite his only 25 years and was able to help his new teammate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series also brings new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get along brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: It is precisely there - at the Lausitzring - that the GT Masters will also be staging its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 supercars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015, he was the last guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track very much," says Zimmermann, who competes for the Friedrichshafen racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally in order to be fast."
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is will become clear in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play a little poker during the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end, however, we are very satisfied and look forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the prelude to a densely packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current situation is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: At the N ü rburgring in mid-August, former Formula 1 driver Niko H ü lkenberg will take up the GT steering wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Transport Minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine holidaymakers in Spain for two weeks after their return has, according to press reports, caught the country's transport minister cold.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Grant Shapps is currently on holiday in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the increasing corona numbers in Spain, the Cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry is possible without quarantine requirements.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to quarantine after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the regulation applies to those who are only on holiday on the cut-off date, only from Saturday, 1 August, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is still considered one of the "safe countries" in Austria for which quarantine is not required.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers must have known in advance that there is a possibility of a quarantine being imposed on holidaymakers in Spain", commented Labour MEP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently nobody bothered to tell Grant Shapps."
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the Corona emergency in Spain and the end of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists mainly blame the nightlife for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the favourite holiday destinations of the British.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government is currently advising against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, with the exception of the Canaries and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that he will equip warships with the most modern hypersonic weapons on Navy Day in his country.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, unique in the world, would expand the combat capabilities of the Russian navy, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defense also informed about successful tests of the Zircon hypersonic rocket built for the Navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of about 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropedeo will be built further
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will continue on the atomically equipped underwater torpedo Poseidon, it was said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The President, who himself also sailed a military boat, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleets of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: For 300 years, the navy has been reliably protecting Russia, Putin said on the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: In many other Russian coastal towns, the naval forces also celebrated the Day of the Navy with parades.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at a weapons show in the Mediterranean port of Tartu.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video released by the Ministry of Defence showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help made more difficult because of Corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington, DC - This year's first hurricane over the Atlantic has landed in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rainfall now threatened parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center of the US Climate Protection Agency (NOAA) announced on Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The Corona pandemic, which is rampant in Texas, is making the work of the helpers more difficult, Abbott continued, according to the US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a huge challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: With regard to the hurricane in Texas, he added, "This challenge is complicated and exacerbated by the fact that it is sweeping through an area that is the most affected by Covid-19 in the state."
tt.com.149061.9: According to John Hopkins University, about 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to be cautious.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "to which we have become accustomed," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms were also provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, tests are to be carried out in emergency shelters on Corona.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, "Hanna" had hit the island of Padre Island directly off the Texas coast.
tt.com.149061.18: The storm had previously been upgraded to a low-level hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a weakening, while "Hanna" moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane Douglas was heading for Hawaii overnight on Sunday with wind speeds of around 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it will be near the largest Hawaiian islands on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA predicted an above-average hurricane season this year, according to a May forecast.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the authority had declared.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: Given available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, and that of a below-average one is only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: Us President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals stripped: Video assistant "punished" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic were stripped of two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals stripped: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening at 0: 2 (0: 1) at SSC Naples in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry at the video assistant of the referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of ungiven goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR acted so harshly against a team, "commented the" Corriere dello Sport ".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Naples took the lead in the 8th minute with a goal from defender Elseid Hisaj, while Filip Djuricic cheered the equaliser in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) withdrew the hit due to an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic kicked the ball back into the net - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: Also the goals of attackers Francesco Caputo (50.) and Domenico Berardi (61.) were taken back by the referee team after hint of the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In extra time, Allan made the 2-0 final score for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a radar trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no other team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets new records, "writes the" Gazzetta dello Sport ".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began for double winner FC Bayern with a setback.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who recovered "reasonably well" after a short vacation and a few days of training, has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to his left foot and threatens to be absent in decisive premier class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In the Munich muddy weather, the right defender broke off a training game and was driven off the court with a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: A match in the second round against Chelsea FC on 8 August should be difficult, the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: But the Bavarians don't want to be stopped by the mishap from Sunday's training.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration are to be shown by his victorious title collectors in the ideally following 28 days until the premier class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: "We simply mastered the mandatory tasks excellently with the championship and the cup.

wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munich team can deal with the final tournament and a training camp in the Algarve, however, the eighth final obligation against Chelsea FC is pending.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3-0 in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners should not become a Bavarian nightmare again in the home arena as in the lost "Finale dahoam" in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and build trust with a good game, "demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to get in the mood is scheduled for Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days of vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He greeted 31 players on S ä bener Stra ß e, including the new players around Edel-Einkauf Leroy Sanst ä lter, who met all new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Leroy, like all the newcomers, fitted in well," Flick reported.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sangorithm & Co. Are no longer only allowed to train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, the team is now training for the Londoners, who, in contrast to the Flick ensemble, are in the rhythm of the game.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, Munich could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, in the semi-finals Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin are possible opponents.
wn.de.700404.24: A way to the final in Lisbon "is not that easy", stressed the head coach, who can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday onwards.
wn.de.700404.25: The World Cup record scorer Klose and Flick know from many a joint tournament preparation, what is particularly important in the 0-on-100 setup.
wn.de.700404.26: Working with his current team is "a pleasure", Flick praised.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive trait of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including Thiago and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts are not guaranteed beyond the premier class season.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA must improvise in order to award the World Championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All races in the United States were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar of the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far, three more circuits were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the N ü rburgring in Germany and Portimo in Portugal will be used.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November Lewis Hamilton and Co. Will fight for World Championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: According to the current status, the 2020 racing calendar thus comprises 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased to continue to make significant progress in completing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula One wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November before the already officially scheduled races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the regulations of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the award of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, there are only two continents, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles on the basis of "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming Corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula One will not be visiting America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Rejection meets with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races will not take place in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being with them again next season," Carey said.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it", said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in S ü dtirol o Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, the number of infections in the area of Shio o Paulo is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: In addition, the concerns of some teams not wanting to drive in Brazil would not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known late-night show and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate expert Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US late-night show via video.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her struggle against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also talked about her famous "evil eye" when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless commitment to the Fridays For Future movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known late-night show about her plans for the future and her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Late-night host Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to steer the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children takes to the streets," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and political leaders who scoff at her on social media, or even try to silence her, find her "funny" because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was approached about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitterly evil eye after US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the UN Climate Summit 2019 in New York, for which the actress sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was captured by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, an animated image that eventually became one of the most commonly used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she replied briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture laughing for a moment.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you" speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmunder Immobile with threesome pack for Lazio Rome
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now on a par with Bavaria's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Shoe.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: The former Dortmund Ciro Immobile still has the best chances to become the top scorer in the Italian football championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB professional contributed three goals in the 5-1 (1: 1) victory of Lazio Rome at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in the extra time of both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: This means that the 30-year-old from fourth in the standings now has 34 goals in his account before the end of the season - the same number scored by Robert Lewandowski from FC Bayern Munich in the past Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar met Sampdoria Genoa with the leader in the evening.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drug junkie, cult fan: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members announced in an official statement on Saturday that a further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a "monumental loss" for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: The drummer Fleetwood and the guitarist Green had founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" is still unforgotten today.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") resembled a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a rapid rise - but the band celebrated their greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: It is said that there was a dispute, among other things, because Green wanted to donate all the profits of the group to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to appear in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Three years later, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.15: This was followed by a social decline.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived temporarily on the street, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working class family in Bethnal Green, London.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: At a young age, he became interested in American blues musicians such as B. B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven, he learned to play guitar.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to be the lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners on stage.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Shortly afterwards, he was hired by the Bluesbreakers to replace his idol Eric Clapton.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green formed Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 with fellow bluesbreakers Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross", composed by Green, gave the group their first number one hit in the winter of 1968 / 69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on the life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that happened to me in life is the drugs - the best thing was to land a number one hit".
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved a respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite several small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until 1996, when he restarted with a group of friendly musicians.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke at that time of a rock star who had returned to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band disbanded in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his gentle sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
